alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 27 at 2:15AM CST until February 27 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts in excess of 30 mph expected through mid-morning. * WHERE...Much of south central and southwest Arkansas, north central and northwest Louisiana, deep east and northeast Texas and southeast Oklahoma. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. In addition, strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
